  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El lenguaje de las funciones</string>
            <string language="en">The language of functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sprache von Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le langage des fonctions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A língua das funções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il linguaggio delle funzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γλώσσα των λειτουργιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones cuestiones relacionadas con las gráficas de funciones reales de variable real. Se estudian el dominio, la imagen, la variación y la tendencia de una función a través de su gráfica.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study matters related to the graphs of real-valued functions of a real variable. It studies the domain, image, variation and tendencies of a function by analysing its graph.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">variación</string>
            <string language="en">variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tendencia</string>
            <string language="en">tendency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">imagen</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dominio</string>
            <string language="en">domain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, Stoffe zu studieren auf den Diagrammen von 
Realwertfunktionen einer realen Variable in Verbindung stand. Es
studiert das Gebiet, das Bild, die Variante und die Tendenzen einer 
Funktion, indem es sein Diagramm analysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations étudier des sujets a associées aux graphiques des 
fonctions à valeurs réelles d'une vraie variable. Il étudie 
le domaine, l'image, la variation et les tendances d'une fonction en 
analysant son graphique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
estudar matérias relacionou aos gráficos de funções real-valued de
uma variável real. Estuda o domínio, a imagem, a variação e 
as tendências de uma função analisando seu gráfico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
studiare gli argomenti ha collegato ai grafici delle funzioni 
real-valued di una variabile reale. Studia il settore, 
l'immagine, la variazione e le tendenze di una funzione analizzando il
relativo grafico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις στα θέματα μελέτης αφορούσε τις γραφικές 
παραστάσεις των real-valued λειτουργιών μιας πραγματικής 
μεταβλητής. Μελετά τη δικτυακή γειτονιά, την εικόνα, την 
παραλλαγή και τις τάσεις μιας λειτουργίας με την ανάλυση της 
γραφικής παράστασής του.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Variante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tendenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebiet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tendance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">domaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
